name: DeleteBulkTagsMetrics
description:
Delete custom lists of queryable tag keys for metrics.

This tool deletes all custom queryable tag keys for a given set of metrics identified by a name prefix. It is used with application keys that have 'Manage Tags for Metrics' permission and can notify specified account emails on completion.

parameters.name: metric_name_prefix
parameters.description: A text prefix to match against metric names for tag deletion.

value_schema.description: A text prefix to match against metric names.

parameters.name: metric_bulk_configure_tags_resource
parameters.description: The identifier for the metric bulk configure tags resource, which should be 'metric_bulk_configure_tags'.

value_schema.description: The metric bulk configure tags resource.

parameters.name: notification_emails
parameters.description: A list of account emails to notify when the configuration is applied.

value_schema.description: A list of account emails to notify when the configuration is applied.
